00059 #ifndef HEADER_CAST_H
00060 #define HEADER_CAST_H
00061 
00062 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00063 extern "C" {
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #ifdef OPENSSL_NO_CAST
00067 #error CAST is disabled.
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 #define CAST_ENCRYPT    1
00071 #define CAST_DECRYPT    0
00072 
00073 #define CAST_LONG unsigned long
00074 
00075 #define CAST_BLOCK  8
00076 #define CAST_KEY_LENGTH 16
00077 
00078 typedef struct cast_key_st
00079     {
00080     CAST_LONG data[32];
00081     int short_key;  /* Use reduced rounds for short key */
00082     } CAST_KEY;
00083 
00084  
00085 void CAST_set_key(CAST_KEY *key, int len, const unsigned char *data);
00086 void CAST_ecb_encrypt(const unsigned char *in,unsigned char *out,CAST_KEY *key,
00087               int enc);
00088 void CAST_encrypt(CAST_LONG *data,CAST_KEY *key);
00089 void CAST_decrypt(CAST_LONG *data,CAST_KEY *key);
00090 void CAST_cbc_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out, long length,
00091               CAST_KEY *ks, unsigned char *iv, int enc);
00092 void CAST_cfb64_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out,
00093             long length, CAST_KEY *schedule, unsigned char *ivec,
00094             int *num, int enc);
00095 void CAST_ofb64_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out, 
00096             long length, CAST_KEY *schedule, unsigned char *ivec,
00097             int *num);
